description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Atlantic Smoked Salmon Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn salad,Pescatarian,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Easter,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Prawn & Atlantic Smoked Salmon Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g medium cooked tiger prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact
1 small red onion, halved, very thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the large outer leaves of the lettuce and discard. Thickly slice the lettuce and divide among serving plates.
Arrange the salmon, cucumber, onion, tomato, prawns and avocado on lettuce. Just before serving, spoon over dressing, sprinkle with basil and season with freshly ground black pepper.
